name: Terra Furtivus
description:
-- Terra Furtivus -- 

Brassica is a small quiet town that has only existed for the last 100 years, because the valley was surrounded by mountains for over 1,000 years until an earthquake opened up the valley once again. A single person from this town will do the wrong thing for the right reasons which will change lives of everyone he knows forever.

Join Cherry and friends as they fight through web obsessed spiders, ancient spirits, inquisitive shadows and foul smelling zombies to save her little town from complete destruction.

This was originally supposed to be a small game to test the limits of RPGMaker MV, but over time it ballooned to a much bigger project. It's a short game but it has a lot of love put into it despite some of it's small budget shortcoming. I do hope you enjoy playing it. :]

Shout out to Yanfly for his plugins.
